Class ID3V1info

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ID3V1info
public class ID3V1info
extends java.lang.Object

Captures the information from the ID3V1 or ID3V1.1 tag of an MP3 file, if it is present.

Version:
1.0 - September 23, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery

Constructor Summary
ID3V1info(java.io.File f)
          Locate the ID3 information at the end of the file, if present.
 
Method Summary
 void showInfo()
          Display the ID3 information from an MP3 file.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

ID3V1info

public ID3V1info(java.io.File f)
Locate the ID3 information at the end of the file, if present. Extract the various strings for display by the showInfo() method.
